DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether addition milk milk constituent calcium protein high-fat breakfast affect postprandial lipid inflammatory response .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 27 kg/m2 Smoking Diabetes mellitus Cardiovascular disease Familial hypercholesterolemia lipid lower medication Severe condition might interfere study outcome , COPD , asthma , rheumatoid arthritis , etc . Unstable body weight Abuse alcohol drug Participation another biomedical study past 30 day Having donate blood past 30 day
